author: Home Repair Tutor
description: I need to polish this tile to help it fit against the ceiling. One solution is an electroplated polishing pad. I’m using Rock Steady’s 60 grit pad with an adjustable speed Makita grinder. This works great when you just need to remove a fraction of an inch #tileshower #toolsoftrade #homerepairtutor
title: Tile Polishing Tips - #shorts #tileshower #homerepairtutor
